title: This game is a joke.....
body: I go 20-3-8 as RAMMUS JUNGLE and I don't even get an s- are you freaking kidding me.. the grading system is a freaking joke.   Just cuz I don't have a certain amount of farm should not mean anything when u have a score like that and carry your whole freaking team.   I had more kp then the whole other team had in total kills.  Grades need to be based on performance, not for champs who sit and just farm all damn day..

replies.body:
1. KDA doesnt matter, since you can easy steal a kill.

2. You are competing against other Rammus players in things such as Vision Score, Creep Score, Damage, and Damage Taken/Prevented.
to prove my point further,,,, I just went 4-3-9 on rammus, with less then 100 farm.. and got an S.. HOW THE HELL DOES THAT WORK?!?!?  20-3-8 gets not even S- when 4-3-9 gets  full S
Evidence? Other statistics from the game? And no your point was “I carried because of my score why no S” this doesn’t prove that
All lower stats on game s was rewarded except maybe damage to turret. Everything else wasn't even close.

KDA has little to no effect on your score, because it has little to no effect on winning the game.

What matters is damage dealt (champions and objectives), vision (placed and destroyed), CC, gold gained, participation in teamfights.

Most damage in game, highest cc score, only one person had one more gold and was around 600 more, mean while our yas top who was 3-1 ,, got an s just cuz he sat in lane, did nothing but farm. 68% kp for me as well.. W.e I'm over it , just a big freaking joke is all.

You are not competing against your team: you are competing against other rammus players.
its based on how well other rammus players perform. So obviously you didnt stack up.
Never seen a rammus get 20 kills in a game....

Get a vision rank >15,  score between 100-200 CS,  take 1-2 towers and dragons/baron.  Don't feed.  Get kills.   This is the recipe for perfect S games.
You could go 45 and 0 and MAYBE get an S-,  but if you want an S or S+  you'll need objectives and vision score.  It's the only way.

Yea I know how it works, just saying is bs that having that sort of impact for your team and winning the game isn't a higher part of the equation , and I did have over 100 farm.  and took most of objectives. But even then turret registration doesn't work right either, did 99% to a turret, just to have minion last hit it for 5 dmg and give me no credit for it.
It's like saying I ks my teammates go 24-4-5 and don't get a S.
hardly, legit carried the entire team,, no ks here....
